website_summaries.verdict: Great for beginners and those getting back into shape with strong alignment features.
pros: Fans include new mothers and those who work long hours and need to stretch and strengthen in compacted periods of time
Noted for its comfort, some current customers are able to utilize the mat multiple times a day
It's also known to get results
cons: Does not come with an anti-slip pad

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you have history of back pain
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to say anything negative about this product as I don't feel it was mislabeled or misleading. However I purchased this to help relieve back pain during crunches and this actually made it worse. I think if you have a healthy back it would probably work beautifully, however I am still recovering from being rearended 6 months ago and my back just couldn't take this. So if you've had any kind of back injury use with caution. I unfortunately had to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Immensely improved work out
customer_reviews.text: I use the mat every day, twice a day. It's much more effective than just doing sit-ups on the floor. It keeps me aligned, and gives me great control over a full range of motion (targeting lower abs, upper abs, or both). My core and back strength has improved immensely. Doing sit-ups on the floor hurt my back more than helped it. I've gone from 50 a day (struggling) to at least 200.
customer_reviews.author: Pali Uli

customer_reviews.title: Gets job done
customer_reviews.text: Just received & tried it out for a few minutes. In all honesty, I felt a bit uncomfortable but this is most likely due to never using an ab mat before. The only thing that I don't like is that it's not anti slip so it's kinda of a nusance to keep correcting position. However, when I managed to do a few crunches I definitely felt it target the abs. I'll have to find a way to keep it from slipping to really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Full range of motion without straining your neck. A total core workout.
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this mat at Cross Fit Gym. It's the best invention out there for abdominal exercises. Full range of motion. No stress on your neck or back. Provides the tip of support that makes it possible to strengthen your core.
customer_reviews.author: J. washington

customer_reviews.title: if you ever do sit ups and your sacral area ...
customer_reviews.text: if you ever do sit ups and your sacral area starts to hurt, this actually helps out. you feel your muscles working more than with the traditional sit-ups of laying flat on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Buyer

customer_reviews.title: good for using o balance on top and great fro stretching but needs more traction to be used most other times
customer_reviews.text: good mat i just wish you didn't slide right off it or down it or have it slide away from you if it kept a better grip it would be a easy 5 star. but having to re position i constantly makes it a bit of a hassle at times
customer_reviews.author: Romes

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if the problem is with the product itself or the whole concept. But it is very (very) uncomfortable. I don’t have back problems but I couldn’t use this product because it made my back hurt each time. I tried it a few times because I thought I needed to get used to it. I really wanted to give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Small change makes big difference
customer_reviews.text: i am so glad I got this. The change in range of motion during the exercises is small but I can feel a huge difference in the muscles it is hitting. Especially in the lower abdominal muscles and side walls when used while laying on the side. I found a tutorial online with a variety of exercises to use on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Missqtpie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: What a great little piece. As mentioned by others, it provides a fuller range of motion for contracting and isolating the abdominal muscles, though it provides tension more so for the upper abs. To incorporate more lower ab recruitment, simply lift a single leg slightly for a set, then switch sides. I found the design to be sufficiently firm and not spongy or too squishy, but if you have a relatively weak, inflexible, or sensitive lower back there may be some temporary discomfort. This thing was too valuable to pass up at $20.
customer_reviews.author: Primal

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Everyone should own one.. THANKS!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and recently had a change of jobs. So sitting all day was making my back hurt! BEgan laying on this baby atleast 15 minutes a day.. WOW I can feel the difference!!! I also use it for working out... no matter what this was so worth it.. I now have it next to my bed.. for daily use!
customer_reviews.author: Imeleb

customer_reviews.title: Nice, firm cusion for ab work.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, firm mat to help you get into the correct position to do crunches on the floor. It is VERY firm, but that is a good thing, and means that it will last a while without breaking down. I'm short (5'1) , so it took a few tries to get my back set on it right, but you can feel the proper core muscles being worked once you get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Koigirl1

customer_reviews.title: Works, my abs have never been so sore.
customer_reviews.text: Trainer recommended this to me, it really does help isolate your abs and work them. I've been doing full range situps and I can feel it all the way up to my rib cage.
customer_reviews.author: Grkgdsss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable; helpful
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable to do abwork with this mat. I used to be distracted by back pain, but now I can do significantly more crunches and actually feel like I'm working my abs. Also, this does not slide around on wood surfaces - a plus!
customer_reviews.author: J. Royall

customer_reviews.title: It hurt at first but that's had bad I needed it.
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people reviewing this product complained it created too big of a painful arch in their lower back for them to use. I found the same at first but as I relaxed and gradually over days I found it to be quite comfortable and it definitely hits your abdominal muscles. I also use it for the oblique's as well. I DO recommend this for the serious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review and Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: The abdominal mat works real well. It's real firm and helps keep the arch in my back, cracks my lower spine, and releases pressure. I do recommend adding an extended fold out flat square mat for the butt, that will fold up and attach to the back of the abdominal mat with Velcro. I find that when coming back up, that the abdominal mat keeps the cure of your lower back in place which then causes your tailbone to dig more into the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemens

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised how awesome it is
customer_reviews.text: As a personal trainer, I'm always looking for ways to enhance my clients' workouts. I didn't expect much at first, but wanted to try this mat out. I was really surprised how awesome it is. Here's a tip from me... if you put your feet on a chair or bench, it really intensifies the effect. This is now my favorite ways to train abs and my clients love it! -Harry Petaccio NASM CPT
customer_reviews.author: Harry Petaccio

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR BUILDING YOUR CORE AND VERY WELL MADE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product for increasing your core strength while protecting your lower back. I loved mine so much that I ended up ordering one for my sister. After showing to my trainer, he was impressed with it enough to order one for the gym! Very sturdy and well made and a great addition to your workout equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Keyboard

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as described. I did have to air it out in the garage overnight due to the odor but it was fine the next day. This ab mat is firm enough to be supportive but also has enough give to it that you don't feel like you are doing sit ups on a brick. I use mine on carpet so I can't comment on whether or not it slips/slides a lot on other surfaces but it stays put on my rug.
customer_reviews.author: MandyMoo

customer_reviews.title: Good support for my bad low back
customer_reviews.text: A drunk driver messed up my lower back, so doing any type of crunches or sit ups were painful for me. This little mat helps out by supporting the areas that need supporting, and I can feel the strength building, which is also helping my low back. My trainer says if I can strengthen my core, it will alleviate my low back pains, I have noticed how the pains are lessened quite a bit after using the Nayoya Ab Mat! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: too hard
customer_reviews.text: What a great concept to target the abs the problem with this product it's too hard and it doesn't give away well you're doing the exercise and you slide back and forth trying to stay on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Only good for small build bodies
customer_reviews.text: Great for small person. To narrow for plus size. Disappointed i have a bad back and made it hurt worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lower back support
customer_reviews.text: I love this item because it helps tremendously with lower back support. Before I actually would stay away from doing crunches and sit ups because of my lower back. I served 10 yrs in the Army and sit ups did a number on my back. I don't why I didn't know about this gem sooner but I'm glad I have it now!
customer_reviews.author: BeBe BaB

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Had for several years now. Use weekly and it still looks new. Does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Texstechfan

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is awesome! I use it with my 8 pound medicine ball, it really offers great back support. The description is accurate, there isn't really anything else to it. I use it everyday and so far I have not had any issues with it. I use it on carpet and it does not slip. If you want to start working out your abs with something weighted, I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: Great ab mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful ab mat. Just like the one I used in my box. There was the faintest odor of rubber when I first received. This completely disappeared after the first week or so. I wouldn't worry about that. I am 5'6" and this mat is a good size for me. Highly recommend this ab mat and the seller. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Too hard, painful to use
customer_reviews.text: Way too hard. I currently weigh around 230lbs. It has 0 give when I STAND on it. Hurts to do sit-ups. Returned for refund. I'll probably just spend the money to get a real one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for some floor dumbbell exercises where I wanted some additional lift off the floor vs. buying a bench. It works well for skull crushers and floor presses, etc. I also use it for certain ab exercises. It is a nice addition to my workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: AJPoe

customer_reviews.title: I use this for an unintended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this originally for exercise as intended. I get really bad back aches and one day decided to lay on this out of desperation. Low and behold stretching on this popped my back and I felt so much better. Now when I get a bad back ache I immediately go lay on this for a few minutes to stretch it out. I realize this is not what it was intended for but if you back problems it is a nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah “Bee” Stayton

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, made well and does what it should! Isolates the abs and is a good addition to at home workouts! I definitely feel like I'm getting way more out of my sit ups and crunches. I would recommend anyone have this for at home workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Marinag92

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and quality. It was exactly what I needed as an addition to my home gym. I highly recommend it to those who are want to get more out of their ab exercises. The Nayoya Abdominal Mat helps abdominals move through their full and available range of motion. Not only will you feel your muscles work but your back will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkin302

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product I use it to sit with my back pressed against the pad, this helps to strengthen my stomach and back muscles so that my posture is at my center. I also use it when I do sit-ups.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It only works if you actually use ...
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to this at a CrossFit class. It was the only thing that made me feel a sit up. It some how always mysteriously ends up in my roommates room... hmmm.... I love it. It only works if you actually use it!
customer_reviews.author: bostongirl2010

customer_reviews.title: Looked good online
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband to try out and he did not like the angle, so we sent it back. It is well made, however.
customer_reviews.author: ArtMom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Tried this in crossfit. It was easy on my lower back, which is why I got one for home. Good quality, helps with core fitness without as much strain
customer_reviews.author: Jaepae

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too firm for my taste. I gave it away to a small gym in my neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Vogelsass

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer and less cushion than i thought
customer_reviews.text: it's harder than i would have liked.. still strains my lower back a bit when doing situps. a bit discomfort going all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: but I am very happy I have my own now
customer_reviews.text: I was undecided about purchasing this for home use after using it during my Crossfit routines at the gym, but I am very happy I have my own now. It is easy to store and move, as well as good quality, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: shay23

customer_reviews.title: especially if you're lazy like I. If nothing else it feels great just ...
customer_reviews.text: This encouraged me to actually work out for a period of time. It's helpful in keeping your positioning correct, especially if you're lazy like I. If nothing else it feels great just to lay on and stretch you're back out, I stand all day at work, often in awkward positions, (typical hairdresser) so sometimes I'll come home and just use this to stretch my back. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: OVRHED Salon

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the Nayoya Abdominal Mat. It helps you strengthen the muscles on the sides of your abs, which conventional crunches can't do.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bonovsky

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: This mat makes doing sit ups or crunches much easier and less painful on the back and butt. It also helps me to do them without having to have another person holding my feet. I really like it and use it every night before bed.
customer_reviews.author: Youhoo

customer_reviews.title: This really does what it promises plus gives you great lower back support for those with back pain/problems
customer_reviews.text: This really does what it promises plus gives you great lower back support for those with back pain/problems. Make sure you use it as detailed in the answers section (being able to read the text when you are standing in front of the mat then step forward and sitting/laying down on it) because the example photos are INCORRECT.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great product, quality material
customer_reviews.text: Nice and firm, great arch support when you're doing your bum-busters, or whatever it is you do. Only gripe I have with it is like other reviews say, it does not have any sort of grip on the bottom, causing it to move slightly when working out on hardwood floor. Seems alright on carpet, and it would be a easy fix by attaching some rubber to the bottom with some adhesive. The material feels durable and long lasting, and whatever kind of padding/foam is inside is very sturdy and firm. It does not give much, and my 2 year old loves to jump on it and it doesn't seem to leave an impression or and noticeable ware.
customer_reviews.author: opepimpston

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for very little money!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone just beginning an exercise regiment know how difficult it is to raise yourself up from a lying position with your hands behind your head. This thing is great. While making it easier to raise myself up, I am feeling the benefit of the sit-up!
customer_reviews.author: Rascalstaff

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable when exercising
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable when exercising. I went from a 39 waist to 36 waist just by using this device and kept eating all the same foods that i eat without changing my food intake.This is a winner -15 minutes everyday and your on your way.
customer_reviews.author: John Ferino

customer_reviews.title: works great, moves a little on my carpet but all in all still great.
customer_reviews.text: works great, moves a little on my carpet but all in all still great. Full range of motion and great quality. Also works great as a knee mat for the ab roller.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are doing situps most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Nothing much to explain. Great quality. Works as prescribed. Make sure to use as often as you want during your situps.
customer_reviews.author: tjbridge

customer_reviews.title: I toiled over whether to pay extra for the one ...
customer_reviews.text: I toiled over whether to pay extra for the one with the padded mat connected but in the end didn't do it and I regret it. When you use this, it doesn't stay in place so you have to keep pushing it in place.
customer_reviews.author: S Knight

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy this item.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing works. I tried it as soon as I received it. It engages the core the entire exercise time. Noticed the difference immediately. I also have this brands acupuncture mat. Both items are quality.
customer_reviews.author: Airman D

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised that I liked this. I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that I liked this. I was skeptical, but I'm glad I purchased it. I use it work every workout. I just wish that it came with some exercise ideas for different ways to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Seems quality, but curve height of lumbar uncomfortable..maybe too much
customer_reviews.text: This is way to high in my opinion. I've used a few different types of these, and this one is hard and has a really "highly curved" lumbar. I'll see how it goes over time.
customer_reviews.author: DaveC

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by results
customer_reviews.text: Great for stretching my back. I also use for situps and other abdominal exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Turkessa Mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels great on my lower back while working ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and feels great on my lower back while working out Fits great under any bed or closet I like it
customer_reviews.author: phillip

customer_reviews.title: Meh decent
customer_reviews.text: It slides if you don't have something propped in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Great mat and great for my butterfly crunches
customer_reviews.text: Great mat and great for my butterfly crunches, but also I use it for padding with my push-ups. Lightweight and great to use.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does help abs but may be used as a sex tool
customer_reviews.author: Christian N.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my lower back!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product! I suffer from lower back pain and this helps take the pressure off when doing sit-ups. It helps me come down slowly onto a soft cushion other than hitting the hard floor.. Great fitness products..
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Ab Mat
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Ab mat. My husband and I are doing an ab challenge this month and both use it. It's similar to the ones at my CrossFit gym. This one seems a bit more firm but I don't mind that since it supports my back better.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Mix-Brundage

customer_reviews.title: ... it felt weird because I have never used anything like this for abs
customer_reviews.text: When I first used the mat it felt weird because I have never used anything like this for abs. After using it a couple times I could feel the difference in my workout. This give me a much bigger ab stretch. I really like it and enjoy feeling the burn.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So helpful during bedtime keeps me in place throughout the night thank you
customer_reviews.author: Stanley K. Kaina Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great way for my to keep a healthy routine at ...
customer_reviews.text: Great way for my to keep a healthy routine at home without hurting my back or my tail bone.
customer_reviews.author: Artsykitty

customer_reviews.title: Mostly fine but not quite right.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly does what it is supposed to do. I am 6' and it just isn't quite the right size for me, compared to the rogue version I have used that was super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Skipp shelly

customer_reviews.title: But this is the first one that I actually look forward to using because it feels so good on your posture and IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every ab device ever invented..... But this is the first one that I actually look forward to using because it feels so good on your posture and IT WORKS!!!!!!! You will love the way this mat lifts & contracts your abs perfectly!!!!! And doesn't take up too much space!!!! Won't ever live without this mat!!! Have recommended it to several friends who have also loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Loni L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout, Strong Back Support
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great. It really positions you so that your abdominal muscles get a great workout. I was sore (in a good way!) after just one workout. Additionally, I have had two major back surgeries over the years, and the Nayoya Ab Mat really protects my spine from injury, offering strong support. I highly recommend the Nayoya Abdominal Mat!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the back
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product I have bought from Noyoya Wellness. I have had back issues in the last couple years and bought to strengthen my core and stretch out the back. It is fantastic and use this with my Noyaya back relief mat.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Orville H. Carroll Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice ab mat that does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice ab mat that does the job, but not as nice as the ones at my box (those are softer).
customer_reviews.author: daniel crowley

customer_reviews.title: Quality is fine. Would return it
customer_reviews.text: One size does not fit. Quality is fine. Would return it, but when you add the shipping cost it is not worth it. Will pass it on to one of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat for the Crossfitter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for on the road workouts when I can't make it to crossfit. It is light and can easily be thrown in your suitcase. It is also good to use at home and better then a a full mat that tends to slip back while doing sit-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Run and do core exercise everyday and this makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Run and do core exercise everyday and this makes it so much more enjoyable even on the floor with just a towel underneath me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this. keeps my low back in a safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this. keeps my low back in a safe, supported position for crunches. I also use to protect my knees during kneeling exercises and and lay on to open up my rib cage and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: It's too thick compared to the ones at my crossfit ...
customer_reviews.text: It's too thick compared to the ones at my crossfit gym. After having this for awhile, it still is holding its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Conner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for back issues
customer_reviews.text: I had back surgery last year, and this works great by taking pressure off your back, so that you utilize your abs only.
customer_reviews.author: raebug

customer_reviews.title: No more back stress!!!
customer_reviews.text: This abdominal mat is perfect for for morning and evening sit-up routine. No more back pain and pulls that always shorten my workout. I highly recommend this item for anyone trying to get in shape at home.
customer_reviews.author: ROC

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This mat really helps me out when doing Sit-Ups. The other day I was traveling, didn't have the mat and did my sit-ups regularly. They hurt a lot more, and worked my abs significantly less. This is a great tool for those who are working to gain core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mat has helped me tremendously in reaching a full ...
customer_reviews.text: This mat has helped me tremendously in reaching a full range of motion when doing abdominal work, especially when I am doing a complete sit up and not just crunches.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: This made me able to do sit-ups.  Buy one and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones in CrossFit class--better because the non-slip strips on the back are still attached. Makes sit-ups possible again in this old body :-)
customer_reviews.author: LilMissBossy

customer_reviews.title: I really like this ab mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ab mat. I have low back issues so I cant do sit ups well and this helps with wanting to get a stronger core. I received it quickly like it stated which was a plus!!
customer_reviews.author: kkershner

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described...it shipped on time. Good experience with this purhcase!
customer_reviews.author: jeng

customer_reviews.title: High arch
customer_reviews.text: Love this ab mat! The high arch has just the right amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Too tall causing discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this abmat is fine for the price but I have to agree with other reviewers that it is too tall which makes it very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my home gym. Gives your back the perfect support, so your crunches can focus on your abdomen.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for full range of motion with abdominal work
customer_reviews.text: Works great for full range of motion with abdominal work! Firm, sturdy and well-built. Thank you for a quality product :)
customer_reviews.author: Enid K.

customer_reviews.title: I like the mat because it keep my lower back from ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat because it keep my lower back from straining when during sit ups. It's comfortable but I wish it was a little larger. Over all still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: The product is nice, useful and fair quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice, useful and fair quality. Still you need to do the exercise.... it does not do magic...
customer_reviews.author: che kuan hsu

customer_reviews.title: No complaints! Comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It makes work outs so much more comfortable. One thing: if you use it shirtless and your back is sweaty, you might stick to the mat and it makes a fart sound when you unstick. I personally think it adds entertainment value but if it bothers you, just lay down a cloth on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is exactly what you expect. The material is soft enough and the shape is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: normas

customer_reviews.title: could be improved, wish i had knew before my purchase
customer_reviews.text: needs to be a bit larger, i think its a bit too small in width
customer_reviews.author: Danny K

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This ab mat is a well made firm product. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It moves a lot even when in control of the sit up/crunch
customer_reviews.author: Sheep

customer_reviews.title: Good for Crossfit and Ab only workouts
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and needed. Don't know the durability of the product, but if I have to buy another it will be the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nazgul21

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The pad helped out a lot. The level of comfort was perfect. The pad is holding up well. The gym I attend uses this same pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat honestly. I have an issue with my back hurting every time I do an ab exercise on the floor and this lifts me up enough that my back doesn't hurt. My only wish is that they had this mat in different sizes because I'm small (5'2) and this was a little too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little bit stiff and uncomfortable at first but better as time went on.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: This is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to do full range crunches. I'm not strong enough to do sit ups so I always do crunches but this gives more range to build strength.
customer_reviews.author: gjhft

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how using this ab mat works your core! It hurts so good, I am in the Military and for us. Policeman, and Fireman we have to do setups for our tests. This has totally helped me crush my P.T. test in the sit up category!!!
customer_reviews.author: SinG

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST. I am so happy I purchased this. My back doesn't hurt and I can do a bigger variety of an workouts. I've seen the change!
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: For my experience: it's curvature doesn't match my lower back one, and it's rigid enough to make sit ups very uncomfortable... it's Useless to me and over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lio-NJ

customer_reviews.title: good design
customer_reviews.text: Creates good even support across back which otherwise you miss and exert too much pressure on one spot in the spine
customer_reviews.author: Ravish

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'-8" and my boyfriend is 5'-11" we love to crossfit and thought this would be good for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'-8" and my boyfriend is 5'-11" we love to crossfit and thought this would be good for at home workouts. Unfortunately the mat is too big for us. It is very thick and very long. Which we all know is normally a good thing but not in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lady

customer_reviews.title: A lot harder than expected...
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose but it a lot harder than the ones I’ve used at any gyms. Wish it had a little more give to it.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat to do crunches on. Protects the void in the lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Arcne

product_meta.title: Nayoya Abdominal Mat for Full Range of Motion Ab Workouts
product_meta.description:
How does the Nayoya ABdominal Mat take standard crunches, sit ups and leg raises to the next level?

The Nayoya ABdominal Mat provides comforting, arched back support during sit ups without putting stress on your back allowing you do perform more repetitions without getting lower back pain. This premium, high quality mat is great for performing ab exercises and increases the effectiveness of standard floor crunches. If you are used to performing ab crunches on a hard floor that results in lower back pain do not worry.

The sleek design contours to your back's natural shape giving your core support and stability without sliding around on the floor and ensures that you abs perform in their full range of motion, from stretched position to contracted position which is typically limited without this mat due to the floor's flat surface.

Using the Nayoya Abdominal Mat ensures your abs perform the way they were meant to perform with a full range of motion allowing you to perform more repetitions to feel the burn without fatiguing.
feature_bullets: PROVIDES firm lower back and lumbar support, stability, constant tension, and an effortless full range of motion workout for your abs and core
REMOVES PRESSURE from your back while maximizing the effectiveness of crunches, sit-ups and leg lifts.
HIGHLY EFFECTIVE Ab and core isolation and engagement during leg lifts, knee raises, crunches and sit-ups for increased core strength
MIMICS THE CURVED SHAPE OF YOUR SPINE allowing your abs to get a proper stretch on the bottom portion of the movement followed by a complete contraction at the top of the movement
REQUIRES NO SET UP: Light, portable, durable, long lasting, sturdy design that stays stable, doesn't wobble or slide and can be thrown in your suitcase or gym bag and taken with you anywhere
